title: support for websockets compression using permessage-deflate
body: Chrome and Firefox support the standards based websockets compression extension permessage-deflate during protocol upgrade negotiation (see https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-hybi-permessage-compression-17).

comments.body: I've written a visualization in HTML with is much slower in sedge on windows, cause the websocket transfer is not compressed
This would be extremely helpful for larger payloads
